pr_title: NMS-12723: Events forwarded by Kafka Producer doesn't have any parameters set

timeline.bodyText:
We don't need to escape here do we?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        String value = EventDatabaseConstants.escape(parm.getValue().getContent() == null ? "" :
          
          
            
                        String value = parm.getValue().getContent() == null ? "" : parm.getValue().getContent();
timeline.author: j-white

timeline.message: NMS-12723: Add event parms for events forwarded by kafka producer
